summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Local Improvement District No. 6737 for the improvement of 47th Avenue Southwest from vacated Maplewood Place Southwest to Southwest Roxbury Street, and certain other avenues, a street, an alley, and easements, by constructing water mains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances; amending Section 1 of Ordinance 110664 to delete one alley from the definition of the improvement, so that only those streets and easements improved are included.
